00178 int nfs_read_worker_conf( config_file_t            in_config,
00179                           nfs_worker_parameter_t * pparam )
00180 {
00181   int     var_max ;
00182   int     var_index ;
00183   int     err ;
00184   char *  key_name ;
00185   char *  key_value ;
00186   config_item_t   block;
00187   
00188   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00189   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL  )
00190     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00191   
00192   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00193   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ) ) == NULL )
00194     {
00195       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER  ) ; */
00196       return  1 ;
00197     }
00198   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00199     {
00200       /* Expected to be a block*/
00201       return 1;
00202     }
00203   
00204   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00205   
00206   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00207     {
00208       config_item_t item;
00209     
00210       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00211       
00212       /* Get key's name */
00213       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00214                                       &key_name,
00215                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00216         {
00217           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n", 
00218                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ); 
00219           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00220         }
00221       
00222       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Pending_Job_Prealloc" ) )
00223         {
00224           pparam->nb_pending_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00225         }
00226       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Before_GC" ) )
00227         {
00228           pparam->nb_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00229         }
00230       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_DupReq_Prealloc" ) )
00231         {
00232           pparam->nb_dupreq_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00233         }
00234       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_DupReq_Before_GC" ) )
00235         {
00236           pparam->nb_dupreq_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00237         }
00238       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Client_Id_Prealloc" ) )
00239         {
00240           pparam->nb_client_id_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00241         }
00242       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_IP_Stats_Prealloc" ) )
00243         {
00244           pparam->nb_ip_stats_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00245         }
00246       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Pending_Job_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00247         {
00248           pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc  = atoi( key_value ) ;
00249         }
00250       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_DupReq_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00251         {
00252           pparam->lru_dupreq.nb_entry_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00253         }
00254       else
00255         {
00256           fprintf( stderr,
00257                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00258                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_WORKER ) ;
00259           return -1 ;
00260         }
00261       
00262     }
00263   
00264 
00265   return 0 ;
00266 } /* nfs_read_worker_conf */
00267 
00268 
00269 
00282 int nfs_read_core_conf( config_file_t          in_config,
00283                         nfs_core_parameter_t * pparam )
00284 {
00285   int     var_max ;
00286   int     var_index ;
00287   int     err ;
00288   char *  key_name ;
00289   char *  key_value ;
00290   config_item_t   block;
00291   
00292   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00293   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL  )
00294     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00295   
00296   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00297   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ) == NULL )
00298     {
00299       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE  ) ; */
00300       return  1 ;
00301     }
00302   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00303     {
00304       /* Expected to be a block*/
00305       return 1;
00306     }
00307   
00308   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00309   
00310  
00311   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00312     {
00313       config_item_t item;
00314     
00315       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00316       
00317       /* Get key's name */
00318       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00319                                       &key_name,
00320                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00321         {
00322           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00323                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ;
00324           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00325         }
00326 
00327       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Worker" ) )
00328         {
00329           pparam->nb_worker = atoi( key_value ) ;
00330         }
00331       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_MaxConcurrentGC" ) ) 
00332         {
00333           pparam->nb_max_concurrent_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00334         }
00335       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DupReq_Expiration" ) )
00336         {
00337           pparam->expiration_dupreq = atoi( key_value ) ;
00338         }
00339       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NFS_Port" ) )
00340         {
00341           pparam->nfs_port = (unsigned short)atoi( key_value ) ;
00342         }
00343       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Drop_IO_Errors" ) ) 
00344         {
00345           pparam->drop_io_errors = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00346         }
00347       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Drop_Inval_Errors" ) ) 
00348         {
00349           pparam->drop_inval_errors = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00350         }
00351       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "MNT_Port" ) )
00352         {
00353           pparam->mnt_port = (unsigned short)atoi( key_value ) ;
00354         }
00355       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NFS_Program" ) )
00356         {
00357           pparam->nfs_program = atoi( key_value ) ;
00358         }
00359       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "MNT_Program" ) )
00360         {
00361           pparam->mnt_program = atoi( key_value ) ;
00362         }
00363       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Core_Dump_Size" ) ) 
00364         {
00365           pparam->core_dump_size = atol( key_value ) ;
00366         }
00367       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Max_Fd" ) ) 
00368         {
00369           pparam->nb_max_fd = atoi( key_value ) ;
00370         }
00371       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_File_Path" ) )
00372         {
00373           strncpy( pparam->stats_file_path, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00374         }
00375       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_Update_Delay" ) )
00376         {
00377           pparam->stats_update_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00378         }
00379       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Dump_Stats_Per_Client" ) )
00380         {
00381           pparam->dump_stats_per_client = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00382         }
00383       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Stats_Per_Client_Directory" ) )
00384         {
00385           strncpy( pparam->stats_per_client_directory, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00386         }
00387       else
00388         {
00389           fprintf( stderr,
00390                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00391                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_CORE ) ;
00392           return -1 ;
00393         }
00394       
00395     }
00396   
00397 
00398   return 0 ;
00399 } /* nfs_read_core_conf */

00413 int nfs_read_dupreq_hash_conf( config_file_t                in_config,
00414                                nfs_rpc_dupreq_parameter_t * pparam )
00415 {
00416   int     var_max ;
00417   int     var_index ;
00418   int     err ;
00419   char *  key_name ;
00420   char *  key_value ;
00421   config_item_t   block;
00422 
00423    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00424   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00425     return -1 ;
00426 
00427   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00428   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ) == NULL )
00429     {
00430       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ; */
00431       return 1 ;
00432     }
00433   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00434     {
00435       /* Expected to be a block*/
00436       return 1;
00437     }
00438   
00439   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00440 
00441   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00442     {
00443       config_item_t item;
00444     
00445       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00446       
00447       /* Get key's name */
00448       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00449                                       &key_name,
00450                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00451         {
00452           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00453                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ;
00454           return  -1 ;
00455         }
00456 
00457       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00458         {
00459           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00460         }
00461       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00462         {
00463           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00464         }
00465       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00466         {
00467           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00468         }
00469       else
00470         {
00471            fprintf( stderr,
00472                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00473                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_DUPREQ ) ;
00474            return -1 ;
00475         }
00476     }
00477   
00478 
00479   return  0 ;
00480 } /* nfs_read_dupreq_hash_conf */

00495 int nfs_read_ip_name_conf( config_file_t             in_config,
00496                            nfs_ip_name_parameter_t * pparam )
00497 {
00498   int     var_max ;
00499   int     var_index ;
00500   int     err ;
00501   char *  key_name ;
00502   char *  key_value ;
00503   config_item_t   block;
00504 
00505    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00506   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00507     return -1 ;
00508 
00509   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00510   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ) == NULL )
00511     {
00512       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ; */
00513       return 1 ;
00514     }
00515   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00516     {
00517       /* Expected to be a block*/
00518       return 1;
00519     }
00520   
00521   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00522 
00523   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00524     {
00525       config_item_t item;
00526     
00527       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00528       
00529       /* Get key's name */
00530       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00531                                       &key_name,
00532                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00533         {
00534           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00535                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ;
00536           return  -1 ;
00537         }
00538 
00539       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00540         {
00541           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00542         }
00543       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00544         {
00545           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00546         }
00547       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00548         {
00549           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00550         }
00551       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Expiration_Time" ) )
00552         {
00553           pparam->expiration_time = atoi( key_value ) ;
00554         }
00555       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Map" ) ) 
00556         {
00557            strncpy( pparam->mapfile, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00558         }
00559       else
00560         {
00561            fprintf( stderr,
00562                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00563                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_IP_NAME ) ;
00564            return -1 ;
00565         }
00566     }
00567   
00568 
00569   return  0 ;
00570 } /* nfs_read_ip_name_conf */

00584 int nfs_read_client_id_conf( config_file_t               in_config,
00585                              nfs_client_id_parameter_t * pparam )
00586 {
00587   int     var_max ;
00588   int     var_index ;
00589   int     err ;
00590   char *  key_name ;
00591   char *  key_value ;
00592   config_item_t   block;
00593 
00594    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00595   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00596     return -1 ;
00597 
00598   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00599   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ) == NULL )
00600     {
00601       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ; */
00602       return 1 ;
00603     }
00604 
00605   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00606 
00607   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00608     {
00609       config_item_t item;
00610     
00611       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00612       
00613       /* Get key's name */
00614       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00615                                       &key_name,
00616                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00617         {
00618           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00619                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ;
00620           return  -1 ;
00621         }
00622 
00623       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00624         {
00625           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00626         }
00627       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00628         {
00629           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00630         }
00631       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )
00632         {
00633           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00634         }
00635       else
00636         {
00637            fprintf( stderr,
00638                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00639                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ;
00640            return -1 ;
00641         }
00642     }
00643 
00644 
00645   return  0 ;
00646 } /* nfs_client_id_conf */

00660 int nfs_read_state_id_conf( config_file_t               in_config,
00661                             nfs_state_id_parameter_t * pparam )
00662 {
00663   int     var_max ;
00664   int     var_index ;
00665   int     err ;
00666   char *  key_name ;
00667   char *  key_value ;
00668   config_item_t   block;
00669 
00670    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00671   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00672     return -1 ;
00673 
00674   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00675   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_STATE_ID ) ) == NULL )
00676     {
00677       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_STATE_ID ) ; */
00678       return 1 ;
00679     }
00680 
00681   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00682 
00683   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00684     {
00685       config_item_t item;
00686     
00687       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00688       
00689       /* Get key's name */
00690       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00691                                       &key_name,
00692                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00693         {
00694           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00695                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_STATE_ID ) ;
00696           return  -1 ;
00697         }
00698 
00699       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00700         {
00701           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00702         }
00703       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00704         {
00705           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00706         }
00707       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )
00708         {
00709           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00710         }
00711       else
00712         {
00713            fprintf( stderr,
00714                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00715                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ;
00716            return -1 ;
00717         }
00718     }
00719 
00720 
00721   return  0 ;
00722 } /* nfs_state_id_conf */

00724 
00737 int nfs_read_uidmap_conf( config_file_t                 in_config,
00738                           nfs_idmap_cache_parameter_t * pparam )
00739 {
00740   int     var_max ;
00741   int     var_index ;
00742   int     err ;
00743   char *  key_name ;
00744   char *  key_value ;
00745   config_item_t   block;
00746 
00747    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00748   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00749     return -1 ;
00750 
00751   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00752   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ) == NULL )
00753     {
00754       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CLIENT_ID ) ; */
00755       return 1 ;
00756     }
00757   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00758     {
00759       /* Expected to be a block*/
00760       return 1;
00761     }
00762 
00763   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00764 
00765   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00766     {
00767       config_item_t item;
00768     
00769       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00770       
00771       /* Get key's name */
00772       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00773                                       &key_name,
00774                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00775         {
00776           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00777                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ;
00778           return  -1 ;
00779         }
00780 
00781       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00782         {
00783           pparam->hash_param.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00784         }
00785       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00786         {
00787           pparam->hash_param.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00788         }
00789       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) )
00790         {
00791           pparam->hash_param.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00792         }
00793       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Map" ) )
00794         {
00795           strncpy( pparam->mapfile, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00796         }
00797       else
00798         {
00799            fprintf( stderr,
00800                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00801                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER ) ;
00802            return -1 ;
00803         }
00804     }
00805 
00806   return  0 ;
00807 } /* nfs_read_uidmap_conf */

00907 int nfs_read_krb5_conf( config_file_t            in_config,
00908                         nfs_krb5_parameter_t *   pparam )
00909 { 
00910   int     var_max ;
00911   int     var_index ;
00912   int     err ;
00913   char *  key_name ;
00914   char *  key_value ;
00915   config_item_t   block;
00916 
00917    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00918   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00919     return -1 ;
00920 
00921   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00922   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ) == NULL )
00923     {
00924       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ; */
00925       return 1 ;
00926     }
00927   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00928     {
00929       /* Expected to be a block*/
00930       return 1;
00931     }
00932 
00933   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00934 
00935   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00936     {
00937       config_item_t item;
00938     
00939       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00940       
00941       /* Get key's name */
00942       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00943                                       &key_name,
00944                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00945         {
00946           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00947                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ;
00948           return  -1 ;
00949         }
00950     
00951       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "PrincipalName" ) ) 
00952         {
00953           strncpy( pparam->principal, key_value, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00954         }
00955       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "KeytabPath" ) ) 
00956         {
00957           strncpy( pparam->keytab, key_value, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00958         }  
00959       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Active_krb5" ) )
00960         {
00961           pparam->active_krb5 = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00962         }
00963       else
00964         {
00965            fprintf( stderr,
00966                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00967                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_KRB5 ) ;
00968            return -1 ;
00969         }
00970       }
00971 
00972   return 0 ;
00973 } /* nfs_read_krb5_conf */

00989 int nfs_read_version4_conf( config_file_t                in_config,
00990                             nfs_version4_parameter_t *   pparam )
00991 {
00992   int     var_max ;
00993   int     var_index ;
00994   int     err ;
00995   char *  key_name ;
00996   char *  key_value ;
00997   config_item_t   block;
00998 
00999    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
01000   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
01001     return -1 ;
01002 
01003   /* Get the config BLOCK */
01004   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ) == NULL )
01005     {
01006       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ; */
01007       return 1 ;
01008     }
01009   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
01010     {
01011       /* Expected to be a block*/
01012       return 1;
01013     }
01014 
01015   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
01016   
01017   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
01018     {
01019       config_item_t item;
01020     
01021       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
01022     
01023       /* Get key's name */
01024       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
01025                                       &key_name,
01026                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
01027         {
01028           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
01029                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ;
01030           return  -1 ;
01031         }
01032 
01033       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Lease_Lifetime" ) )
01034         {
01035           pparam->lease_lifetime = atoi( key_value ) ; 
01036         }
01037       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "FH_Expire" ) ) 
01038         {
01039           pparam->fh_expire = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
01040         }
01041       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Returns_ERR_FH_EXPIRED" ) )
01042         {
01043           pparam->returns_err_fh_expired = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
01044         }
01045       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_OPEN_CONFIRM" ) )
01046         {
01047           pparam->use_open_confirm = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
01048         }
01049       else
01050         {
01051            fprintf( stderr,
01052                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
01053                     key_name, CONF_LABEL_NFS_VERSION4 ) ;
01054            return -1 ;
01055         }
01056       }
01057 
01058   return 0 ;
01059 } /* nfs_read_version4_conf */

01073 {

01075               pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc) ;

01078 } /* Print_param_worker_in_log */
